column4: anybody install kernels?  i get "ls: 'initrd.img.old': File exists" to ln -s initrd.img-2.6.10-1.1127_FC4.dwmw2 initrd.img.old.  Can I make up a link such as 'initrd.img.FC4Alien' that'l show up on my boot loader?
why do you have that link there in the first place?
I want to be able to pick which ever kernel to boot up with
